description: Standalone systems are some of the most difficult and annoying systems to secure. When not automated, they require manual changes of each STIG/SRG. Totalling over 1000 configuration changes on a typical deployment and an average of 5 minutes per change equaling 3.5 days worth of work. This script aims to speed up that process significantly.
displayName: Standalone-Windows-STIG - Completely STIG Standalone Windows Systems to DoD STIG/SRG Requirements and NSACyber Guidance.
